meanings.definition: Feeding on a limited variety of food sources.
meanings.sent1: The panda is oligophagous, mainly eating bamboo shoots.
meanings.sent2: The bird's oligophagous nature is evident as it only consumes seeds and insects.
meanings.sent3: It's quite amusing to see the oligophagous koala munching on eucalyptus leaves all day.
meanings.sent4: Her oligophagous diet of salads and fruits is like a simple melody in a world of complex symphonies.
meanings.sent5: The image of the oligophagous caterpillar munching on a single leaf is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Having a diet that consists of only a few types of food.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel's oligophagous behavior involves mainly nuts and berries.
meanings.sent2: An oligophagous bear will stick to fish and berries for its meals.
meanings.sent3: It's funny to watch the oligophagous rabbit turn its nose up at anything other than carrots.
meanings.sent4: Her oligophagous eating habits are like a painter using only a few colors on their palette.
meanings.sent5: The concept of an oligophagous diet is as clear as a cloudless sky.
